source_sentence: 佛說鬼問目連經
translation: Foshuo gui wen muqien jing

source_sentence: 後漢安息國三藏安世高譯
translation: An Shigao Translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Later Han Kingdom of Anzhi

source_sentence: 聞如是：一時佛住王舍城迦蘭陀竹園。
translation: Thus I heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at the Kalandaka's Bamboo Park in Rājagṛha.

source_sentence: 爾時目連晡時從禪定起，遊恒水邊，見諸餓鬼受罪不同。
translation: In the afternoon, Maudgalyāyana rose from his meditation and wandered near the Gaṅgā River and saw that the hungry ghosts were suffering from different kinds of sins.

source_sentence: 時諸餓鬼見尊者目連，皆起敬心，來問因緣。
translation: When the hungry ghosts saw Venerable Maudgalyāyana, they all arose in respect and came to ask about the cause and conditions.

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生以來，恒患頭痛。
translation: One ghost asked, "All my life, I've had constant headaches.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What's the cause of this sin?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，好以杖打眾生頭。
translation: Mucilin answered, "When you were a human being, you used to beat the heads of sentient beings with a stick.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and will end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，資財無量而樂著弊衣。
translation: A demon asked, "Since my whole life, I've had an unlimited amount of possessions and enjoyed wearing poor clothing.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What crime did that cause?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，布施作福，還復悔惜。
translation: Mucilin answered, "When you were a human being, you gave generosity and made merit, but you still regretted it.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果在地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，宿無常處，恒倚巷陌。
translation: A ghost asked, "Since my whole life, I've been living in impermanent places and always living on the street.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What crime did that cause?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，客來投止，不肯安處；見他客止，方復瞋恚。
translation: Mucilin answered, "When you were a human being, you refused to settle down when a visitor came to stay, and you only became angry when you saw another visitor stay.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and will end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我食不噉一斛而不得飽。
translation: A demon asked, "I couldn't get enough food without devouring a tub.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What crime did that cause?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，飯飼眾生，初不令足。
translation: Maudgalyāyana replied, "When you were a human being, you fed sentient beings with food and didn't make them enough at first.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and will end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，腹大如甕，咽細如針孔，不得下食。
translation: A ghost asked, "Since I was born, my belly has been as big as a jar, and my throat has been as small as a needle's hole, so I haven't been able to get down to eat.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What sin did that cause?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，作聚落主，自恃豪強，輕欺百姓，強打拍人，索好美食。
translation: Mucilin answered, "When you were a human being, you were a village leader who relied on your own strength, despised the people, forcibly beat people, and demanded good food.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and will end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，恒患男根瘡爛，痛不可言。
translation: A ghost asked, "Since my whole life, I've always had sores on my male faculties that hurt beyond words.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What's the cause of this sin?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，佛圖精舍清淨之處，行於婬欲。
translation: Maudgalyāyana replied, "When you were a human being, you practiced sexual lust in the pure abode of Fotucheng's temple.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and will end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來多有兒子，皆端正可喜而皆早死。
translation: A ghost asked, "I've had many sons since my lifetime, and they were all decent and delightful, but they all died young.

source_sentence: 念之斷絕，痛不可言。
translation: I can't even begin to tell you how much it hurts to stop thinking about them.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What was the sin that caused this?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，見兒殺生，助喜噉肉；殺生故短命，喜故痛毒。
translation: Maudgalyāyana answered, "When you were a human being, you saw your child killing life and enjoyed eating meat; because you killed life, your life was short, and because you enjoyed it, it was painful and poisonous.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and go to hell as a result."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，有一狗體大牙利，兩目赫赤，常來噉我。
translation: A demon asked, "Since I was born, there's been a dog with large, sharp teeth and red eyes that used to come and eat me.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What crime did that cause?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，喜將狗獵，殘害眾生，無有慈心。
translation: Maudgalyāyana replied, "When you were a human being, you liked to hunt dogs and brutalize sentient beings without compassion.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果在地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，有一人持諸利刀，常割我肉，盡便持去，須臾尋生而復來割，痛不可言。
translation: A demon asked, "Since my lifetime, there's been a man who used to cut my flesh with sharp knives, then took it away when it was done, and in a moment's time he was reborn and came back to cut it again, causing pain that defies explanation.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What was the result of that sin?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，喜屠割眾生，初無慈心。
translation: Maudgalyāyana replied, "When you were a human being, you liked to slaughter living beings and had no compassion in the beginning.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and will end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，恒患身體，處處皆痛，不可得忍。
translation: A ghost asked, "Since I was born, I've always had pain in my body, and it's unbearable everywhere.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What's the cause of this sin?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，好漁獵，所網得魚投之沙土，令其苦死。
translation: Mucilin answered, "When you were a human being, you liked fishing and hunting, and the fish you caught in your net were cast into the sand and dirt, causing them to die a painful death.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and will end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，頑無所知。
translation: A demon asked, "I've been stubborn and ignorant since my lifetime.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What was the result of that sin?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，強勸人酒，令其顛倒。
translation: Mucilin answered, "When you were a human being, you strongly encouraged people to drink wine, causing them to be deluded.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and will end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，恒患熱渴，行見恒河，冀入其中以除熱渴。
translation: A demon asked, "Ever since I was born, I've always had fever and thirst, and when I walk along it, I see the Ganges River and want to enter it to get rid of my fever and thirst.

source_sentence: 方入其中，身體焦爛，肌肉離骨；渴欲飲之一口入腹，五藏焦爛，痛不可言。
translation: Just before I entered it, my body burned, and my muscles separated from my bones; when I wanted to drink a mouthful of it and went into my belly, my five stores were scorched, and I couldn't tell you how much pain it caused.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What sin did that cause?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，喜焚燒山澤，殘害眾生。
translation: Maudgalyāyana replied, "When you were a human being, you liked to burn mountains and swamps and brutalize sentient beings.

source_sentence: 今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Now, you'll be rewarded with flowers and will end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，恒患飢渴，欲至廁上取糞噉之。
translation: A demon asked, "Ever since I was born, I've always been hungry and thirsty, and I want to go up to the toilet to get some dung and eat it.

source_sentence: 廁上有大力鬼，以杖打我，初不能得近。
translation: A powerful demon on the toilet beat me with a stick, but at first I couldn't get close to it.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What was the cause of that sin?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，作佛圖主。
translation: Mucilin answered, "When you were a human being, you were the master of the Buddha's image.

source_sentence: 有客比丘來，慳惜不與食。
translation: When a visiting monk came, you were stingy and didn't give him any food.

source_sentence: 待客去後，乃行與舊僧。
translation: After the guest left, you then gave it to an old monk.

source_sentence: 慳惜僧物故，今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Being stingy with the property of the saṃgha, now you'll be rewarded with flowers and will end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，恒處不淨，臭惱纏身，不能得離；飢渴之時，還食此不淨。
translation: A ghost asked, "Since my whole life, I've always been in an impure place, and I've been plagued by a stench that I can't get rid of; when I'm hungry and thirsty, I still eat this impurity.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What sin has caused this?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，作婆羅門子。
translation: Mucilin answered, "When you were a human being, you were a brāhmaṇa.

source_sentence: 有一道人，中後來就汝乞食。
translation: There was a man who came to you midway through the day to solicit alms.

source_sentence: 汝爾時當作是方便，令此道人不復來乞，便取其鉢，盛糞著底，以飯覆之。
translation: Do this then, as a favor, cause that person to stop begging, take his bowl, put some dung in its bottom, and cover it with rice.

source_sentence: 道人得鉢，還至本處，著一面澡漱既訖，攝鉢欲食，鉢中臭穢不可得近。
translation: When he got the bowl, he returned to his original place, washed himself on one side, gathered his bowl in the hope of eating, and then the bowl smelled so bad that he couldn't get close to it.

source_sentence: 以是之故，墮在地獄，汝將來世墮糞屎彌犁地獄中。」
translation: As a result, he fell into hell, and you'll fall into the hell of excrement and mirrors in a future life."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，肩上有銅瓶，盛滿中洋銅。
translation: A ghost asked, "Since I was born, I've had a copper vase over my shoulder that's full of copper from the middle of the ocean.

source_sentence: 一手捉銅杓以取之，還灌其頭，痛不可言。
translation: I took a copper ladle in one hand and poured it back over my head, causing pain that defies explanation.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What crime did that cause?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，作僧維那知僧事。
translation: Mucilin answered, "When you were a human being, you became a monk and knew the business of the saṃgha.

source_sentence: 有一瓶酥藏著餘處，不行與僧，待客去後，乃行與舊僧。
translation: You had a jar of butter hidden away somewhere, and you didn't give it to the saṃgha until after the guests had left.

source_sentence: 此酥是招提僧物，一切有分。
translation: This butter is a property of the soliciting saṃgha, and all of it has a share.

source_sentence: 慳惜僧物故，今受花報，果入地獄。」
translation: Being stingy with the property of the saṃgha, now I'll be rewarded with flowers and go to hell as a result."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生已來，或登刀山、劍樹地獄，或墮火坑、鑊湯地獄，種種受苦，無復休已。
translation: A ghost asked, "Since my lifetime, I've sometimes climbed a mountain of swords or a sword tree, or I've fallen into a fire pit or a caldron, and I've suffered in various ways without ever being able to stop.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What was the result of that sin?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，作天祠主，烹殺三牲，祭祀天神，血肉灌灑四方，語眾人言：『汝等祠祀，大得吉利！』
translation: Maudgalyāyana answered, "When you were a human being, you were the director of a celestial shrine, and you cooked three animals, sacrificed them to the gods, spilled their flesh and blood in all directions, and said to the people, 'This is a very auspicious sacrifice!'

source_sentence: 作此魔邪之言、妖孽之語，輕欺百姓，誑惑父母。
translation: They speak such evil words and speak such demonic words, deceiving the people lightly and deceiving their parents.

source_sentence: 以是之故，果入地獄。」
translation: As a result, I'll end up in hell."

source_sentence: 一鬼問言：「我一生以來，常吞鐵丸。
translation: A ghost asked, "All my life, I've always swallowed an iron ball.

source_sentence: 何罪所致？」
translation: What crime did that cause?"

source_sentence: 目連答言：「汝為人時，作沙彌子，取淨水作石蜜漿。
translation: Mucilin answered, "When you were a human being, you became a novice monk and took pure water to make rock honey syrup.

source_sentence: 石蜜堅大，盜打取少許；眾僧未食，盜食一口故。
translation: The rock honey was so strong and large that you stole a little bit of it and beat it, stealing a mouthful before the saṃgha ate it.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，果入地獄，汝將來世常吞鐵丸。」
translation: Because of this cause and condition, you'll end up in hell, and you'll always swallow an iron ball in a future life."

source_sentence: 爾時目連與諸餓鬼說往昔因緣經竟，還來在耆闍崛山。
translation: After speaking with the hungry ghosts about the causes and conditions of the past, Maudgalyāyana returned to Mount Gṛdhrakūṭa.

source_sentence: 一切大會，聞佛所說，稽首奉行。
translation: All the people in the assembly who heard what the Buddha taught bowed their heads and approved.

source_sentence: 佛說鬼問目連經
translation: The Buddha taught the Sutra on the Demons' Questions to Maudgalyāyana.
